EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Email_Spring Drip and Nurture_Q119.Email 3 - Training and Certification
EmailTemplate.subject: Grow your skill set: Get professionally certified on Spring
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Are you a developer using Spring and looking to have your skill set recognised? If you answered “yes” then the Spring Certification qualification is for you.
You’re already using Spring Boot to build production-ready applications, Spring Cloud is enabling you to coordinate anything, simplifying microservice style architecture by implementing proven patterns to bring resilience, reliability, and coordination to your microservices. Further increase your employability by adding value to your resume with our Spring Professional Certification.
Learn more here <[[https://pivotal.io/training/certification/spring-professional-certification?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=E3-training-certification-default]]>.
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. Unsubscribe <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html]]>. Manage your subscription preferences <[[https://pivotal.io/subscription-management]]>.
